help-file.title: "MAGIC-USER" "MAGIC USER" MAGE
help-file.content:
The term "Magic-User" defines a class of individuals who spend their lives training in the use of arcane magical spellcraft. They are the ones who stand at the back of a party during battle and hurl powerful offensive spells at the enemy. Because they are so powerful in their discipline, they are typically the most frail in stature.
There are subclasses of Magic-User, each with their own specialties: Sorcerers, Necromancers and Conjurer classes that are very specific to Magic-Users. Being part of the larger class-group, these classes are affected by the same class restrictions on equipment and are similar in to-hit rolls and average hit points. There are also some other classes that only loosely fall within the "Magic-User" definition, these are: Psionicists, Illusionists and Alchemists. These sub-classes tend to have similar resistances and susceptibilities to things like spells, paralysis, dragon breath, etc. Each sub-class rises in level according to its own experience chart.
NOTE: Use "help <classname>" for information on each of the sub-classes.
